tool_description: Welcome to the Health Calculator API (HCA). This API provides endpoints for calculating A Body Shape Index (ABSI), Adjusted Body Weight (AjBW), Basal Energy Expenditure (BEE) and Total Energy Expenditure (TEE) , Body Adiposity Index (BAI), Body Frame Size Index (BFSI), Body Mass Index (BMI), Body Fat Percentage, Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR), Daily Caloric Needs (DCN), Daily Water Intake (DWI), Estimated Average Glucose(eAG), Estimated Energy Requirement (EER), The FFMI (Fat-Free Mass Index), Ta...
name: Health Calculator API
title: Health Calculator API

api_list.name: Navy Body Fat
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the body fat percentage of an individual based on the provided measurements and determines compliance with the U.S. Navy standards.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: **age** (Required): Age of the individual.

required_parameters.name: sex
required_parameters.description: **sex** (Required): Gender of the individual (***male*** or ***female***).

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: **height** (Required): Height of the individual in centimeters.

required_parameters.name: neck
required_parameters.description: **neck** (Required): Neck circumference of the individual in centimeters.

required_parameters.name: waist
required_parameters.description: **waist** (Required): Waist circumference of the individual in centimeters.

optional_parameters.name: hip
optional_parameters.description: **hip** (Optional): Hip circumference of the individual in centimeters. This parameter is only required for ***females***.

api_list.name: US Army Body Fat
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the body fat percentage of an individual based on the provided measurements and determines compliance with the U.S. Army standards.

required_parameters.name: sex
required_parameters.description: **sex** (Required): Gender of the individual (***male*** or ***female***).

required_parameters.name: neck
required_parameters.description: **neck** (Required): Neck circumference of the individual in centimeters.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: **age** (Required): Age of the individual.

required_parameters.name: waist
required_parameters.description: **waist** (Required): Waist circumference of the individual in centimeters.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: **height** (Required): Height of the individual in centimeters.

optional_parameters.name: hip
optional_parameters.description: **hip** (Optional): Hip circumference of the individual in centimeters. This parameter is only required for ***females***.

api_list.name: Micronutrient Requirements (GET)
api_list.description: Calculate the daily requirement of a specific micronutrient using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: micronutrient
required_parameters.description:
The specific micronutrient for which the requirement is calculated. Valid values include:
 "**calcium**" 
"**chromium**" 
"**copper**" 
"**fluoride**" 
"**iodine**" 
"**iron**" 
"**magnesium**" 
"**manganese**" 
"**molybdenum**" 
"**phosphorus**" 
"**selenium**" 
"**zinc**" 
"**potassium**" 
"**sodium**" or "**chloride**"

required_parameters.name: gender
required_parameters.description: The gender for which the micronutrient requirement is calculated. Valid values are "**male**" or "**female**"

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: The age of the individual for whom the micronutrient requirement is calculated. Note that this endpoint is not meant for children below 9 years.

api_list.name: Calculate BEE and TEE (GET)
api_list.description: Calculate Basal Energy Expenditure (BEE) and Total Energy Expenditure (TEE) using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of the individual in centimeters.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of the individual in kilograms.

required_parameters.name: activity_level
required_parameters.description:
The activity level of the individual. Choose from the following options:
'**bed-ridden**': Lying, sleeping, eating.
'**light or sedentary**': Sitting (e.g., office work), watching TV, cooking, personal care, driving a car, light walks, typical household duties.
'**moderate to active**': Standing, carrying light loads (e.g., waiting tables), longer walks, light aerobic exercises, commuting by bus.
'**heavily active**': Agricultural work, manual labor, heavy-duty cleaning, strenuous exercises performed on a regular basis.

required_parameters.name: gender
required_parameters.description: The gender of the individual ('**male**' or '**female**').

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: The age of the individual in years.

optional_parameters.name: stress_factor
optional_parameters.description:
The stress factor that may affect energy expenditure. Choose from the following options (default is '**none**'):
'**none**'
'**solid tumor**'
'**leukemia/lymphoma**'
'**inflammatory bowel disease**'
'**liver disease**'
'**burns**'
'**pancreatic disease**'
'**general surgery**'
'**transplantation**'
'**sepsis**'
'**abscess**'
'**other infection**'

optional_parameters.name: temperature
optional_parameters.description:
The body temperature of the individual. Choose from the following options (default is '**normal**'):
'**normal**'
'**>= 100.4°F or 38°C**'
'**>= 102.2°F or 39°C**'
'**>= 104°F or 40°C**'
'**>= 105.8°F or 41°C**'

api_list.name: Calculate TDEE (GET)
api_list.description: Calculate the Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE) of an individual using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of the individual in kilograms.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: The age of the individual in years.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of the individual in centimeters.

required_parameters.name: gender
required_parameters.description: The gender of the individual ('**male**' or '**female**').

required_parameters.name: activity_level
required_parameters.description:
The activity level of the individual. Choose from the following options:
'**sedentary**' (little to no exercise)
'**light exercise**' (light exercise or sports 1-3 days a week)
'**moderate exercise**' (moderate exercise or sports 3-5 days a week)
'**hard exercise**' (hard exercise or sports 6-7 days a week)
'**physical job**' (physically active job or training)
'**professional athlete**' (professional athlete or highly active job)

optional_parameters.name: equation
optional_parameters.description:
The equation used to calculate BMR. Choose from the following options (default is '**mifflin**'):
'**mifflin**' (Mifflin-St Jeor Equation)
'**harris**' (Harris-Benedict Equation)

api_list.name: Estimated Energy Requirement (GET)
api_list.description: Calculates the estimated energy requirement (EER) for maintaining energy balance in healthy, normal-weight individuals.

required_parameters.name: gender
required_parameters.description: The gender of the individual ('**male**' or '**female**').

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: The age of the individual in years.

required_parameters.name: activity_level
required_parameters.description:
The physical activity level, which can be one of the following:
'**sedentary**' (for a sedentary lifestyle)
'**low active**' (for a low active lifestyle)
'**active**' (for an active lifestyle)
'**very active**' (for a very active lifestyle)

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of the individual in kilograms.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of the individual in centimeters.

api_list.name: Calculate eAG (GET)
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the eAG value based on the provided HbA1c percentage using a GET request.

required_parameters.name: hba1c
required_parameters.description: (**float**): The HbA1c value as a percentage.

api_list.name: Body Frame Size Index (BFSI)
api_list.description: Calculate the Body Frame Size Index using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: Height of the individual in **centimeters**.

required_parameters.name: wrist
required_parameters.description: Wrist circumference of the individual in **centimeters**.

required_parameters.name: sex
required_parameters.description: Sex of the individual ('**male**' or '**female**').

api_list.name: Body Adiposity Index (BAI)
api_list.description: Calculates Body Adiposity Index (BAI) using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: Height in **meters**.

required_parameters.name: hip
required_parameters.description: Hip circumference in **centimeters**.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: Age of the individual.

required_parameters.name: sex
required_parameters.description: Gender of the individual (**male** or **female**).

api_list.name: Adjusted Body Weight (AjBW) - Imperial
api_list.description: Calculate AjBW and IBW based on the provided sex, height, and weight in the imperial system.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of the person in **pounds**.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of the person in **inches**.

required_parameters.name: sex
required_parameters.description: The sex of the person. Allowed values: **male**, **female**.

api_list.name: Adjusted Body Weight (AjBW)
api_list.description: Calculate AjBW and IBW based on the provided sex, height, and weight.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of the person in **kilograms**.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of the person in **centimeters**.

required_parameters.name: sex
required_parameters.description: The sex of the person. Allowed values: **male**, **female**.

api_list.name: A Body Shape Index (ABSI)
api_list.description: The ABSI Calculator endpoint allows you to calculate the A Body Shape Index (ABSI) and its corresponding z-score and mortality risk based on the provided parameters.

required_parameters.name: waist_circumference
required_parameters.description: The waist circumference of the individual in centimeters for '**metric**' unit, and inches for '**imperial**' unit.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of the individual in centimeters for '**metric**' unit, and inches for '**imperial**' unit.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: The age of the individual in years.

required_parameters.name: sex
required_parameters.description: The gender of the individual. Accepted values are '**male**' and '**female**'.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of the individual in kilograms. for '**metric**' unit, and pounds for '**imperial**' unit

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of measurement used for height, weight, and waist circumference. Accepted values are '**metric**' (default) and 'imperial'. If '**imperial**' is used, the height should be in inches, weight in pounds, and waist circumference in inches.

api_list.name: Body Mass Index
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the BMI based on the provided height and weight parameters.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height in **centimeters**. Required.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight in **kilograms**. Required.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: The desired units of measurement to implement in the JSON Response. Possible values are **metric** (default) or **imperial**. (Optional).

api_list.name: BMI - Imperial
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the BMI based on the provided height and weight parameters in imperial units.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight in **pounds**. Required

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height in **inches**. Required

api_list.name: Fat-Free Mass Index (FFMI)
api_list.description: This FFMI (Fat-Free Mass Index) Calculator endpoint allows you to calculate the FFMI score, which describes the amount of muscle mass in relation to height and weight. FFMI is part of the family of body indexes, together with well-known and similar BMI. However, FFMI is more precise than BMI and provides information about somebody's condition and health.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of the individual. For **metric** units, use weight in **kilograms**, and for **imperial** units, use weight in **pounds**.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of the individual. For **metric** units, use height in **centimeters**, and for **imperial** units, use height in **inches**.

required_parameters.name: unit
required_parameters.description: The unit of measurement for height and weight. Possible values are \"**metric**\" (default) and \"**imperial**\".

required_parameters.name: sex
required_parameters.description: The gender of the individual (**male** or **female**).

required_parameters.name: body_fat
required_parameters.description: The body fat percentage of the individual.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format of the response. Possible values are \"**yes**\" (default) or \"**no**\". If \"**yes**,\" the response values will be formatted as **kg/m²** or **lb/m²** based on the unit of calculation. If \"**no**,\" the response values will be provided without formatting.

api_list.name: Macronutrient Distribution
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the optimal distribution of macronutrients (carbohydrates, proteins, and fats) based on factors such as activity level, body composition goals, and dietary preferences.

required_parameters.name: activity_level
required_parameters.description:
The activity_level parameter accepts the following values:

**sedentary** - Little to no exercise.
**moderately_active** - Moderate exercise/sports 3-5 days/week.
**very_active** - Hard exercise/sports 6-7 days/week.

required_parameters.name: body_composition_goal
required_parameters.description:
The body_composition_goal parameter accepts the following values:

**weight_loss** - Goal of losing weight.
**maintenance** - Goal of maintaining current weight.
**muscle_gain** - Goal of gaining muscle.

required_parameters.name: dietary_preferences
required_parameters.description: The dietary_preferences parameter allows users to specify their dietary preferences. It can be any string value representing the individual's dietary choices or restrictions, such as \"**vegetarian**,\" \"**vegan**,\" \"**pescatarian**,\" or \"**gluten-free**.\"

api_list.name: Target Heart Rate
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the target heart rate range for cardiovascular exercise based on the user's age and fitness level. It uses the Karvonen method to determine the target heart rate zone.

required_parameters.name: fitness_level
required_parameters.description:
The fitness level of the user.

The fitness_level parameter accepts the following values:
**beginner** - Beginner fitness level.
**intermediate** - Intermediate fitness level.
**advanced** - Advanced fitness level.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: The age of the user in years.

api_list.name: Daily Water Intake
api_list.description: The Daily Water Intake Recommendation endpoint calculates the daily recommended water intake based on factors such as weight, activity level, and climate. It provides flexibility by allowing you to specify the unit of measurement for the water intake, either in liters or ounces.

required_parameters.name: climate
required_parameters.description:
The climate in which the individual is located.

The climate parameter accepts the following values:
**normal** - Average climate
**hot** - Hot climate
**cold** - Cold climate

required_parameters.name: activity_level
required_parameters.description:
The activity level of the individual. 

The activity_level parameter accepts the following values:
**sedentary** - Little to no exercise
**lightly_active** - Light exercise/sports 1-3 days/week
**moderately_active** - Moderate exercise/sports 3-5 days/week
**very_active** - Hard exercise/sports 6-7 days/week
**extra_active** - Very hard exercise/sports and physical job or 2x training

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of the individual in **kilograms (kg)**.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of measurement for the water intake. 
(Default) **ounces**
 Specify **liters** to get the result in liters instead.

api_list.name: Daily Caloric Needs
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a simple and efficient way to calculate daily caloric needs based on various factors such as age, weight, height, activity level, and goal. It offers different formulas or approaches for caloric needs estimation, including the popular Harris-Benedict equation and Mifflin-St. Jeor equation.

required_parameters.name: activity_level
required_parameters.description: The activity level of the person. Valid values are \"**sedentary**\", \"**lightly_active**\", \"**moderately_active**\", \"**very_active**\", or \"**extra_active**\".

required_parameters.name: gender
required_parameters.description: The gender of the person. Valid values are \"**male**\" or \"**female**\".

required_parameters.name: goal
required_parameters.description: The goal of the person. Valid values are \"**weight_loss**\", \"**maintenance**\", or \"**weight_gain**\".

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of the person in **kilograms**.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of the person in **centimeters**.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: The age of the person in years.

optional_parameters.name: equation
optional_parameters.description: The equation to use for caloric needs estimation. Valid values are \"**harris**\" (default) or \"**mifflin**\".

api_list.name: Ideal Body Weight
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to calculate the ideal weight range based on factors like height, body frame size, and gender. The endpoint provides different formulas and approaches for ideal weight estimation, such as the Hamwi method and the Devine formula.

required_parameters.name: gender
required_parameters.description: The gender of the person. It can be either \"**male**\" or \"**female**\".

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height in **centimeters (cm)** of the person for whom you want to calculate the ideal weight.

required_parameters.name: body_frame
required_parameters.description: The body frame size of the person. It can be one of the following values: \"**small**\", \"**medium**\", or \"**large**\".

optional_parameters.name: formula
optional_parameters.description:
You can include an optional query parameter to specify the formula or approach for ideal weight estimation. It can be one of the following values:
\"**hamwi**\" (default): The Hamwi method for ideal weight calculation.
\"**devine**\": The Devine formula for ideal weight calculation.

api_list.name: Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR)
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to calculate the Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) based on age, weight, height, and gender parameters. The BMR represents the number of calories needed to maintain basic bodily functions at rest.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight in **kilograms**.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height in **centimeters**.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: The age in **years**.

required_parameters.name: gender
required_parameters.description: The gender (either "**male**" or "**female**").

optional_parameters.name: equation
optional_parameters.description: (optional string): The equation to use for the calculation. Valid options are "**mifflin**" (default) or "**harris**".

api_list.name: BodyFat
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the body fat percentage based on the provided gender, age, height, and weight parameters.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height in **centimeters**. Required.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight in **kilograms**. Required.

required_parameters.name: gender
required_parameters.description: The gender of the person. Possible values are **male** or **female**. Required.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: The age of the person in years. Required.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The desired units of measurement to implement in the JSON Response. Possible values are **metric** (default) or **imperial**. (Optional).

api_list.name: BodyFat - Imperial
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the body fat percentage based on the provided gender, age, height, and weight parameters in imperial units.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: The age of the person in **years**. Required.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of the person in **pounds**. Required.

required_parameters.name: gender
required_parameters.description: The gender of the person. Must be either '**male**' or '**female**'. Required.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of the person in **inches**. Required.
